creator: sibylle.stromeyer@wyona.com
text:
Threads
- Thread display options - sort by, sort order, from date 
- Thread and forum subscription (notification by email) 
- Active Users viewing thread shown 

New Post Indicator 
- Printer Friendly versions on threads 
- Email page to a friend option 
- Similar Threads displayed on all thread views 

Posts
- Linear, Threaded
- Quick reply box 
- Preview post option 
- Post rating 
- User reputation 

Polls 
- Post Reporting - report posts to moderators 
- Admin tools for Posts - edit/delete/move/ etc 
- Preview safe attachments 

Members
- Member List 
- Member Search 
- Private Messaging 
- Calendar Features

Calendar
- Viewable events
- weekly, monthly and yearly views 
- Add single, ranged or recurring events 
- Add all day events 
- Option to show calendar event on forum home page
- Show events to specific usergroups 
 
Calendar Moderation 
- subscribed events reminder 
- Ability to add custom fields 

General
- Who's online 
- Search

creator: florent.andre-dev@4sengines.com
text: Integrated in the Lenya 3 wished features : http://wiki.apache.org/lenya/Lenya 3.0
